page.title: 17RECREATION IN STOCKTON.
page.content: THE VILLAGE HAS A THRIVING SOCIAL LIFE MOST OF WHICH REVOLVES AROUND THE VILLAGE HALL AND THE HUNDRED HOUSE HOTEL(PRESENTLE CLOSED). REGULAR MEETINGS ARE HELD BY THE WOMENS INSTITUTE,YOUTH CLUB,OLD TIME DANCING,KEEP FIT, OVER 6OS & LADIES GUILD.THERE IS A BRANCH OF THE BRITISH LEGION,AFOOTBALL TEAM,A BOWLING CLUB.A DARTS & DOMINOES TEAM, A SQUIRREL CLUB (WHICH ATTEMPTS TO QUELL THE GREY SQUIRREL POPULATION ON THE ESTATE).OTHER SOCIAL ACTIVITIES THROUGHOUT THE YEAR INCLUDE CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING,DISCOS,BINGO,RUMMAGE SALES,A CHRISTMAS BAZAAR,NORTON FLOWER SHOW,SUNDAY SCHOOL,CHRISTMAS TOY SALE, GUY FAWKLES NIGHT BONFIR AND PANTOMINE.A PLAY GROUP FOR PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN HAS RECENTLY BEEN FORMED.
